summary: This mod adds new npcs to Skyrim. They are all potential companions and Spouses.
descriptionHtml:
Important: I have decided to split this mod up into many seperate mods. The filesize was getting ridiculously out of hand with them all together. I am working on the quest, Worldspace, and Large Dungeon that will make up the character Elioden Ward's story first.

This mod adds new npcs to Skyrim. They are all potential companions and Spouses.

Elioden Ward's Companions currently adds seven companions. All with original Skyrim voices and no

quests, you can just walk up to them and recruit them. I plan on, in time, voicing them all and

adding quests. There will also be more than seven companions in the end but the current list of

npcs added is...

(My PC characters that are included...)
Elioden Ward, Nord, Paladin: Temple of the Divines, Solitude
Eushija Ice-Walker, Argonian, Mage: The Frozen Hearth, Winterhold
Shumal Steel-Heart, Argonian, Warrior: Silver Blood Inn, Markarth


(Random characters that I made on the spot, but am developing backstories for)
Kalif the Wanderer, Nord, Bard/Archer: Frost Fruit Inn, Rorikstead
Aslandi of Morrowind, Dark Elf, Mage: Dragonsreach, Whiterun
Kanesha the Swift, Argonian, Thief: Plains District, Whiterun
Naklo Half-Giant, Nord, Warrior: Marketplace, Windhelm

ChangeLog:

0.5 - Initial Release
0.6 - Fixed a few glitches where the men would use female animations.
author: Elioden Ward
